title: The Murderbot Diaries
author: Martha Wells
review: Currently my favorite book series. Murderbot is such a great character, and the way the story is told through its perspective is so unique.

title: The Sworn Soldier
author: T. Kingfisher
review: I never understood what "cozy horror" was until I read this series. Haunting but oddly comforting at the same time.

title: The Locked Tomb
author: Tamsyn Muir
review: Manages to combine sci-fi and fantasy with amazing world-building. Excited for the next book!

title: The Space Between Worlds
author: Micaiah Johnson
review: Such an original take on the idea of parallel universes and alternate selves.

title: Mexican Gothic
author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
review: The creepy atmosphere of this book is unmatched. Had me on the edge of my seat the entire time.

title: Ancillary Justice
author: Ann Leckie
review: The book uses its sci-fi setting to the fullest. Definitely want to read the whole series some time.
